newsitem.title: USA: BioTime raises $5.6 mln in rights offering.
newsitem.headline: BioTime raises $5.6 mln in rights offering.

text.p: BioTime Inc said it raised about $5.6 million through the sale of 283,109 common shares in its recently completed rights offering.
It said the rights offering was heavily over-subscribed, and that it appears that very few, if any of the $6.8 million of over-subscriptions will be filled.

BioTime is involved in the research and development of synthetic blood plasma volume expanders and technology for use in surgery, emergency trauma treatment and the preservation of organs awaiting transplant.
